select.if:
select * from ( ${listado} ) x left join ( select region_edomex_2017, region_edomex_2017,municipio, region_edomex_2017,municipio,seccion,
SUM(case when _1 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, SUM(case when _1 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total, SUM(case when _1 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'NS_NC' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_total,
SUM(case when _2 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,sum(case when _2 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, sum(case when _2 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, SUM(case when _2 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,sum(case when _2 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, sum(case when _2 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total, SUM(case when _2 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_hombres,sum(case when _2 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_mujeres, sum(case when _2 = 'NS_NC' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_total,
sum(case when _3 = 'PAN' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) pan_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'PAN' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) pan_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'PAN' then 1 else 0 end) pan_total, sum(case when _3 = 'PRI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) pri_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'PRI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) pri_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'PRI' then 1 else 0 end) pri_total, sum(case when _3 = 'PRD' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) prd_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'PRD' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) prd_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'PRD' then 1 else 0 end) prd_total, sum(case when _3 = 'PT' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) pt_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'PT' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) pt_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'PT' then 1 else 0 end) pt_total, sum(case when _3 = 'PVEM' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) pvem_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'PVEM' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) pvem_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'PVEM' then 1 else 0 end) pvem_total, sum(case when _3 = 'PANAL' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) panal_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'PANAL' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) panal_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'PANAL' then 1 else 0 end) panal_total, sum(case when _3 = 'PES' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) pes_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'PES' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) pes_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'PES' then 1 else 0 end) pes_total, sum(case when _3 = 'MORENA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) morena_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'MORENA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) morena_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'MORENA' then 1 else 0 end) morena_total, sum(case when _3 = 'INDEPENDIENTE' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) independiente_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'INDEPENDIENTE' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) independiente_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'INDEPENDIENTE' then 1 else 0 end) independiente_total, sum(case when _3 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total, sum(case when _3 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'NS_NC' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_total,
sum(case when _4 = 'JOSEFINA_VAZQUEZ_MOTA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) josefina_vazquez_mota_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'JOSEFINA_VAZQUEZ_MOTA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) josefina_vazquez_mota_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'JOSEFINA_VAZQUEZ_MOTA' then 1 else 0 end) josefina_vazquez_mota_total, sum(case when _4 = 'ALFREDO_DEL_MAZO_MAZA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) alfredo_del_mazo_maza_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'ALFREDO_DEL_MAZO_MAZA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) alfredo_del_mazo_maza_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'ALFREDO_DEL_MAZO_MAZA' then 1 else 0 end) alfredo_del_mazo_maza_total, sum(case when _4 = 'JUAN_ZEPEDA_HERNANDEZ' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) juan_zepeda_hernandez_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'JUAN_ZEPEDA_HERNANDEZ' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) juan_zepeda_hernandez_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'JUAN_ZEPEDA_HERNANDEZ' then 1 else 0 end) juan_zepeda_hernandez_total, sum(case when _4 = 'DELFINA_GOMEZ_ALVAREZ' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) delfina_gomez_alvarez_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'DELFINA_GOMEZ_ALVAREZ' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) delfina_gomez_alvarez_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'DELFINA_GOMEZ_ALVAREZ' then 1 else 0 end) delfina_gomez_alvarez_total, sum(case when _4 = 'OSCAR_GONZALEZ_YANEZ' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) oscar_gonzalez_yanez_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'OSCAR_GONZALEZ_YANEZ' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) oscar_gonzalez_yanez_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'OSCAR_GONZALEZ_YANEZ' then 1 else 0 end) oscar_gonzalez_yanez_total, sum(case when _4 = 'ISIDRO_PASTOR_MEDRANO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) isidro_pastor_medrano_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'ISIDRO_PASTOR_MEDRANO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) isidro_pastor_medrano_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'ISIDRO_PASTOR_MEDRANO' then 1 else 0 end) isidro_pastor_medrano_total, sum(case when _4 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'NS_NC' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_total,
SUM(case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,sum(case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, sum(case when _5 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, SUM(case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,sum(case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, sum(case when _5 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total, SUM(case when _5 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_hombres,sum(case when _5 = 'NS_NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_mujeres, sum(case when _5 = 'NS_NC' then 1 else 0 end) ns_nc_total,
sum(case when b.sexo = 'H' then 1 else 0 end) hombres, sum(case when b.sexo = 'M' then 1 else 0 end) mujeres,count(*) total from encuestas_edomex.e_edomex a join encuestas_edomex.encuesta_edomex b on (a.id_contacto::integer = b.id_interno) where
programa_general = upper('${programa}')
1 = 1
and region_edomex_2017 in
'${item.idParticion}'
and municipio in
'${item.idMunicipio}'
group by region_edomex_2017 group by region_edomex_2017,municipio group by region_edomex_2017,municipio,seccion ) y on (x.id = y.region_edomex_2017 y.municipio y.seccion) order by x.id order by total

select region_edomex_2017,municipio,seccion,id_interno id,nombre||' '||apellido_paterno||' '||apellido_materno nombre,
(case when _1 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _1 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _1 = 'MUCHO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_hombres,(case when _1 = 'MUCHO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'MUCHO' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_total, (case when _1 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,(case when _1 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, (case when _1 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nada_hombres,(case when _1 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nada_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'NADA' then 1 else 0 end) nada_total,
(case when _2 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _2 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _2 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _2 = 'MUCHO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_hombres,(case when _2 = 'MUCHO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_mujeres, (case when _2 = 'MUCHO' then 1 else 0 end) mucho__total, (case when _2 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,(case when _2 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, (case when _2 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, (case when _2 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nada_hombres,(case when _2 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nada_mujeres, (case when _2 = 'NADA' then 1 else 0 end) nada_total,
(case when _3 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _3 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _3 = 'MUCHO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_hombres,(case when _3 = 'MUCHO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'MUCHO' then 1 else 0 end) mucho__total, (case when _3 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,(case when _3 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, (case when _3 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nada_hombres,(case when _3 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nada_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'NADA' then 1 else 0 end) nada_total,
(case when _4 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _4 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _4 = 'BUENA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_hombres,(case when _4 = 'BUENA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) mucho_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'BUENA' then 1 else 0 end) mucho__total, (case when _4 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,(case when _4 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, (case when _4 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nada_hombres,(case when _4 = 'NADA' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nada_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'NADA' then 1 else 0 end) nada_total,
(case when _5 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _5 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _5 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,(case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, (case when _5 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, (case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,(case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, (case when _5 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total,
(case when b.sexo = 'H' then 1 else 0 end) hombres, (case when b.sexo = 'M' then 1 else 0 end) mujeres,1 total from encuestas_edomex.e_edomex a join encuestas_edomex.encuesta_edomex b on (a.id_contacto::integer = b.id_interno) where b.seccion ='${seccion}'
and programa_todo = upper('${programa}')
